józsef.name: Balogh József Vendel
józsef.description: József is the creative force behind Quantum Vendetta's gameplay. With a passion for blending sci-fi and fantasy elements, József crafts engaging levels, characters, and storylines that bring our unique world to life.

hunor.name: Karsa Hunor Ákos
hunor.description: Hunor is the technical wizard responsible for the website, launcher, and backend infrastructure. Ensuring a smooth experience for players both in and out of the game, Sam's expertise ties everything together seamlessly.

overview.title: Quantum Vendetta: A New Frontier
overview.p1: Quantum Vendetta is an exhilarating top-down 2D shooter that seamlessly blends sci-fi technology with fantastical elements. Set in a universe where magic and advanced tech coexist, players navigate through intricately designed levels, facing off against a diverse array of enemies.
overview.p2: Our game offers a unique twist on the classic shooter genre, incorporating both futuristic weaponry and mystical abilities. With its rich storyline and immersive world-building, Quantum Vendetta promises an unforgettable gaming experience that pushes the boundaries of the 2D shooter genre.
